title: SkogAI Cloudflare Gateway
content: A stdio-based MCP server that interfaces with Cloudflare services using the official @cloudflare/mcp-server-cloudflare package. Identified by account ID ae931e241550e8326149eeda10ada60d, this gateway provides agents with access to Cloudflare's edge computing, workers, and other cloud infrastructure services.
summary: Cloudflare MCP server for edge computing capabilities

relationships.description: The SkogAI Cloudflare Gateway provides access to the Cloudflare Realm for edge computing and web infrastructure management.
